item.title: View the help guide
item.description:
In addition to these cheat sheets, Debrief has an extensive user guide. Now's a good time to go an read about the other features you can see in the user interface.
So, click on the link below to open the help manual, have a read about the Debrief UI, then come back to this cheat sheet.
